casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Madden.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Madden (2000), 89 Ohio St.3d 238.]

(No. 99-2234 Submitted March 8, 2000 Decided June 21, 2000.) *239Jonathan E. Coughlan, Disciplinary Counsel, and Lori J. Brown, First Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. *240J. Michael Drain, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby permanently disbarred from the practice of law in the state of Ohio. Costs are taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
